lines.text: I am Adora, He-Man's twin sister and defender of the Crystal Castle. This is Spirit, my beloved steed. Fabulous secrets were revealed to me the day I held aloft my sword and said "For the honor of Greyskull!". I am She-Ra!
[Adora transforms into She-Ra, and transforms Spirit into Swift Wind]
Only a few others share this secret. Among them are Light Hope, Madame Razz, and Kowl. Together me and my friends of the Great Rebellion try to defend Etheria from the evil forces of Hordak.

[singing]
Up, up and away, in my wicked doom ballon!
I have no interest in this Blue Knight Imp.
